flawed_nl_solution:
The weight stack weighed 10*30=<<10*30=300>>300 pounds
So the added weight made it 300*0.2=<<300*0.2=60>>60 pounds heavier
So when he lowered the weight it was 300+60=<<300+60=630>>630 pounds
#### 630

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 360, not 630. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
